caption.center: ROBERT LORENZ ET AL. v. INLAND WETLANDS AND WATERCOURSES COMMISSION OF
THE TOWN OF OLD SAYBROOK ET AL.

opinion.opinion_text:
The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 124 Conn. App. 489 (AC 30044), is denied.
Roger Reynolds, in support of the petition.
David M. Royston and Michael E. Cronin, Jr., in opposition.
ROGERS, C. J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
